chapter.text: Your name is Ben.^1500 A senior at LF high, you have made quite a name for yourself in the last 4 years.^1500 Youâ€™ve had many achievements on and off the field.^1500 A model student, the perfect life.^1500 You wake up and slowly lift your head from your desk.^1500 You look around to find that your fellow classmates and even your teacher seem to have left already.^1500 You must have slept through your last period.^1500 The class was never very exciting anyway.
